June 23, 1939
Mr. John B. Ellery
Director
Radio-TV Research
Wayne State University
Detroit 2, Michigan
Dear John:
We have a rush request for recommendations for a
good research man orientated in television or radio to
head up the U. S. Office of Education work on the Title
VII grants. The job will be a GS 14 or 15, pays from
$11,355 up to $12,770 or so. They want the NAEB to help
find the best man possible. The problem is we need some
names by Thursday afternoon. 1 would appreciate your
calling or wiring me (collect if you wish) any suggestions
you have.
Cordially,
Samuel L. Becker
Chairman, NAEB
Research Committee
